sentences.en: Anecdotal evidence suggests that sales in Europe have slipped.
sentences.cn: 传闻有证据表明欧洲的销售量已经下滑。

sentences.en: Britain has the largest and most flourishing fox population in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英国拥有欧洲最大也是最具繁殖能力的狐狸种群。

sentences.en: He is one of the most wanted criminals in Europe.
sentences.cn: 他是欧洲最重要的通缉犯之一。

sentences.en: I solemnly vowed that someday I would return to live in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我郑重发誓，总有一天我将回到欧洲生活。

sentences.en: In Europe, Aga Khan III presented himself in a completely different light.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲，阿迦汗三世表现得完全是另一副样子。

sentences.en: Jean-Phillippe had hitched all over Europe in the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 让－菲利普在20世纪60年代曾搭便车游遍欧洲。

sentences.en: Jim expects to be sent to Europe any day now.
sentences.cn: 吉姆预计随时会被派到欧洲去。

sentences.en: Kaspar had spoken know-ledgeably about the state of agriculture in Europe.
sentences.cn: 卡斯帕对欧洲农业状况发表了一番颇有见地的见解。

sentences.en: Laura Davies is assured of a place in Europe's team.
sentences.cn: 劳拉·戴维斯确信能在欧洲队中占据一席之地。

sentences.en: Nissan now makes cars at two plants in Europe.
sentences.cn: 目前日产公司在欧洲有两家工厂生产汽车。

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧已不复存在。

sentences.en: The Channel Tunnel project is the biggest civil engineering project in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英吉利海峡隧道是欧洲最大的土木工程。

sentences.en: The grand design of Europe's monetary union is already agreed.
sentences.cn: 欧洲统一货币的宏伟构想已经获得认同。

sentences.en: They have removed all tactical nuclear missiles that could strike Europe.
sentences.cn: 他们已经拆除所有能够袭击欧洲的战术核导弹。

sentences.en: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th-century Europe?
sentences.cn: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

phrases.tran_cn: 欧洲理事会；欧洲委员会

trans.tran_cn: 欧洲，欧盟，（除英国以外的）全欧洲，除英国外的欧洲国家
trans.tran_en: the continent that is north of the Mediterranean and goes as far east as the Ural Mountains in Russia
the continent that is north of the Mediterranean and goes as far east as the Ural Mountains in Russia
